Package demo.Zhihao.Server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatServer
    The main class and model of the IMServer.
    Clients
    Handles operation with clients.
    Jabber
    This is used to redirect the messages sent to the server to all the clients that connecting to the server.
    The protocol used to receive the messages is UDP, whereas the protocol used to send messages is TCP.
    This class also do some process to the messages received.
    Member
    an auxiliary class used to represent members.
    Receiver
    Used to receive messages from the specified socket.
    Sender
    This class is used to send messages using TCP protocol.
    This class should never be instantiated.
    UDPReceiver
    This is used to retrieve the messages sent using UDP.
    UIServer
    The GUI part of the IMServer project.
    Welcome
    The class used to answer the connection request via TCP and allocate UDP port number.
    The first class used when connecting the server.
